title: Emerald and Diamond Floral Haaram - A Timeless Statement Piece
materials: Natural Emeralds (Oval & Round Cut). Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a delicate floral motif intricately set with sparkling diamonds. Rich oval and round-cut emeralds are tastefully interspersed, adding a touch of regal elegance. The chain is intricately woven to complement the design, completing this statement piece.
occasions: and upscale social gatherings. A valuable heirloom piece for generations to come.
description: Captivating traditional design with a contemporary touch. Excellent craftsmanship and stone quality. Offers lasting value and is a stunning statement piece for any special occasion. A true emblem of Telugu heritage.
